duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide outstanding service to determine customer’s overall design needs and build client relationships.
Create appointments to visit customer’s homes or workplace to provide product and design advice.
Communicate with vendors to determine product specifications, availability, and sampling requirements.
Maintain showroom by keeping samples, displays and common areas neat, current, and clean.
Collect and process customer payments for each project.
Oversee scheduling of installation team and perform quality control.

education_certification.credential: High School Diploma or G.E.D. (Bachelor’s degree in communications, business management, interior design, or a similar field a plus)
